__e: See what you can find,but don't provoke them.
I was attempting to get a rise out of you, to remind you that no matter where you go or how tedious the work you undertake, it will not change what you are-- a detective.
You don't listen to what I say, and then out of nowhere you provoke me.
You're trying to goad me into revealing information.
We shouldn't provoke them, to buy more time.
Those men... they were paid to provoke a fight and kill us both.
